body: How do I use Github? and what do I do there?
body_tagged: How do I use Github? and what do I do there?
title: Github?

replies.body: I'm not sure exactly how to describe to you what it is, but for Avicus you can report bugs there. https://github.com/Avicus/Issues
replies.body_tagged: I'm not sure exactly how to describe to you what it is, but for Avicus you can report bugs there. https://github.com/Avicus/Issues

replies.body:
GitHub is a site used by programmers, where you share repositories, store programs, code, and track bugs.

On the Avicus side of things, you create an account and post any Avicus related bugs in the "New issue" or you can confirm/discuss about current issues in the "Open" section here: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues
replies.body_tagged:
GitHub is a site used by programmers, where you share repositories, store programs, code, and track bugs.

On the Avicus side of things, you create an account and post any Avicus related bugs in the "New issue" or you can confirm/discuss about current issues in the "Open" section here: https://github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues

replies.body: Github is amazing! You can use it as a programmer to allow you to collaborate on projects. I use it a lot. You can also make websites on it at https://pages.github.com/
replies.body_tagged: Github is amazing! You can use it as a programmer to allow you to collaborate on projects. I use it a lot. You can also make websites on it at https://pages.github.com/
